name: Croce Staff [1]
description: A special staff with the red pattern of Prontera Congregation specially used by the high-status Clergyman.
effect: INT ＋5,[Croce Staff IV] ＋ [Holy Robe IV]: Healing increase ＋ 5%. And when [Holy Robe] Refining is ＋10 or above, the healing increases to 10%

name: Cross Bow [1]
description: The cross shaped bow. Its advantage is that it can give quick continuous shooting and create great destruction.
effect: Dex ＋2,When Dexterity reaches 95, Ranged Phy, Atk ＋10%

description: A cross-shaped bow, with an advantages of fast shooting and destructive power .
effect: Dex ＋2,When Dexterity reaches 95, Ranged Phy, Atk ＋10%

name: Cross Sanction
description: In the name of justice, to eliminate all the sins. Lord guides our way, the cross is shining on the back.

description: A large and dense cross-shaped shield.

name: Crown
description: It makes people more sober with this crown, which has the magic to restore spirit power.
effect: Int ＋3,For Refining ＋1, Dmg to Holy monsters ＋1% (up to ＋15%)

name: Crown of Ancient Queen
description: The ancient queen's hair decoration was made to show the queen's dignity. So it was decorated with luxury items like gold and gems.

name: Crown of Light[1]
description: Holy and glorious, this crown was crafted for the high priest of the elves. A symbol of innocence and prayer, which can only be worn by those with sincere hearts.
effect: Magic Penetration +3%,When attacking a target, has a 100% chance to reduce the target's Magic Reduc. by 5% and Move Spd by 10% for 5 seconds.
